channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform

item.title: CVE-2024-45281|2024-09-16T16:17:11.239Z -- sap_se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform allows a high privilege user to run client desktop applications even if some of the DLLs are not digitally signed or if the signature is broken. The attacker needs to have local access to the vulnerable system to perform DLL related tasks. This could result in a high impact on confidentiality and integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-41730|2024-08-16T04:01:44.403Z -- sap_se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: In SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform, if Single Signed On is enabled on Enterprise authentication, an unauthorized user can get a logon token using a REST endpoint. The attacker can fully compromise the system resulting in High impact on confidentiality, integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-41731|2024-08-13T18:54:27.517Z -- sap_se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform allows an authenticated attacker to upload malicious code over the network, that could be executed by the application. On successful exploitation, the attacker can cause a low impact on the Integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-28166|2024-08-13T13:54:21.863Z -- sap_se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform allows an authenticated attacker to upload malicious code over the network, that could be executed by the application. On successful exploitation, the attacker can cause a low impact on the Integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-41730|2024-08-13T03:31:37.327Z -- sap_se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: In SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform, if Single Signed On is enabled on Enterprise authentication, an unauthorized user can get a logon token using a REST endpoint. The attacker can fully compromise the system resulting in High impact on confidentiality, integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-34684|2024-08-02T02:59:21.825Z -- sap_se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: On Unix, SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Scheduling) allows an authenticated attacker with administrator access on the local server to access the password of a local account. As a result, an attacker can obtain non-administrative user credentials, which will allow them to read or modify the remote server files.

item.title: CVE-2024-28165|2024-06-04T18:03:32.671Z -- sap_se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: SAP Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform is vulnerable to stored XSS allowing an attacker to manipulate a parameter in the Opendocument URL which could lead to high impact on Confidentiality and Integrity of the application

As a result, an attacker can obtain non-administrative user credentials, which will allow them to read or modify the remote server files.
